AboutZidanDevelopments: Zidan Developments is an Egyptian joint-stock real estate company registered with the General Authority for Investment. It is one of the companies under Zidan Group. The company was launched in Qalyubia Governorate in 2015 with a clear engineering and construction vision. Through strategic planning, the company selected prime residential locations and offered innovative real estate solutions that ensure a luxurious lifestyle tailored to meet all the needs of our clients.
Who_we_are_dec: Zidan Developments is a leading real estate development company, offering innovative residential and commercial projects that meet market needs.
